name: Block Smash (itch)
description:
Block Smash - A game developed during Ludum Dare 42 competition. Game is inspired by theme "Running out of Space". Fight for your space with blocks. 

No in game music as it was becoming too repetitive ( lack of sounds), the player gives out a breathe if its too close to an obstacle ( toned down a bit). 

The game picks up pace ( more obstacle and speed) as time passes. Enjoy!!

Tools used to develop the game 

  1. Unity
  2. Aseprite
  3. BFXR
